text: (dutare), heliri; nanna bali allahana bhandaragalive endagali, gupta visayagala jnana nanagide endagali nanu nim'modane helilla. Hageye nanu â€˜malakâ€™ endu kuda nim'modane nanu helikondilla. Nanantu, nannedege kalisalaguttiruva divya sandesavannaste anusarisuttiddene. Heliri; kurudaru mattu kanaballavaru samanare? Nivenu cintisuvudillave
